document_data.name: Crub
document_data.mainbody: Sharp-eye '''Crub''' was a loyal [[Cult of the Absolute|cultist]] of the [[Absolute]] who dwelled among others of his kind at the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He wore a suit of crudely-made [[chainmail]] armor over a blue tunic, with leather britches. His armor was decorated with several small skulls and (presumably) animal bones.
document_data.Possessions: Crub's weapon of choice was a rather plan, but well-functioning, [[bow]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Crub join the cult's raid on the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. He and his fellow devotees of [[the Absolute]] killed many [[Flaming Fist]] soldiers along with some innocent bystanders. They even managed to take some captives, who they marched off to nearby [[Moonrise Towers]].

After the raid, Crub and two of his comrades spent their time playing a favored game, where they imagined the most greusome ways to kill an individual. They focused their attending on the Flaming Fist captain-turned-adventurer, [[Wyll]], the Blade of Frontiers.
